name: Prince Anura Must Feed His Horse
name_original: Prince Anura Must Feed His Horse
description:
Prince Anura boldly climbs the tower to vanquish the evil lurking at the top... but he forgot to leave any food for his horse!

Throw fruit down to your hungry equine friend while avoiding the crumbling bridges and enemies intent on eating the fruit themselves.

Each fruit has a unique special ability that you can use to make the descent a little easier.

---

This is a very early version so not everything is in place yet. Some of the planned changes are:

  • Script the enemies. Currently they do nothing
  • Add more levels
  • Add sound
  • Update the art
  • Add some sort of storyline with cutscenes
  • Add more fruit and more special abilities
  • Fix the pear's special ability
  • All fruit except apples should have limited quantities and will need to be unlocked
  • Potentially come up with a new name for the game

Let me know what you think of the current build!

---
